Attributes.description: Exploration of the diversity of Indigenous peoples of British Columbia and Canada and their unique histories, beginning with origin stories and oral histories and moving on to the histories and relationships that Indigenous groups have with the federal, provincial and territorial governments.
Attributes.coreq: Co-reqs: All of HGSE 370, HGSE 372, HGSE 373, HGSE 374.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00
